core.name: Visual Design Studio
core.description: An integrated visual design environment that combines an infinite canvas (F001), AI-powered component library (F002), and dynamic layout engine (F003) to enable users to create and arrange UI components with AI-driven suggestions and automatic layout adjustments

supporting.name: Design Intelligence
supporting.description: An AI-driven design assistant (F004) that provides users with real-time design suggestions, critiques, and best practices, integrated with version control and collaboration (F005) to facilitate teamwork and design optimization

supporting.name: Customizable Design Templates
supporting.description: A library of pre-built, customizable UI templates (F006) that can be used as a starting point for designs, with integrated design analytics (F010) to provide insights into design trends and user behavior

integration.name: Design Ecosystem
integration.description: A plugin (F007) that allows users to import and export designs from Figma and Sketch, integrated with API integration (F008) to enable seamless connectivity with backend services and other design tools

integration.name: Accessibility and Compliance
integration.description: A feature (F009) that checks UI designs for web accessibility and provides recommendations for improvement, ensuring compliance with industry standards and regulations

analytics.name: Design Insights
analytics.description: A dashboard (F010) that provides insights into user design behavior, UI component usage, and design trends, integrated with AI-driven design recommendations (F011) to facilitate data-driven design decisions

future.name: Immersive Design
future.description: A feature that allows users to design and prototype AR/VR experiences (F012), integrated with voice UI design (F014) to enable users to create immersive, voice-controlled interfaces

future.name: AI-Driven Design Systems
future.description: A feature that generates design systems using AI algorithms and machine learning (F013), enabling users to create customized design systems that integrate with their existing design workflows
